poem:
"An Act Of Love"

In the Thai house of parliament, there's a rumble.
Four hundred hearts for equality - brave and humble.
Casting votes, like throwing stones into silent night,
Ripples echo in applause, breaking traditional fight.
A country poised for progress, thirsty for fairness, 
Same-sex love shining brightly, out of the cloaked darkness,
With this act of love, South-East Asia pledges alliance.
